name: react-element-to-html
description: Convert a React element into static HTML markup

scripts.build: browserify index.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [es2015] ] --standalone reactElementToHtml -o dist/react-element-to-html.js && uglifyjs dist/react-element-to-html.js --source-map dist/react-element-to-html.min.js.map > dist/react-element-to-html.min.js
